name: Growth Fund A
description: A balanced mutual fund focusing on growth stocks with moderate risk. Suitable for investors seeking capital appreciation with medium-term investment horizon.

name: Conservative Bond Fund
description: A low-risk bond fund investing in government and high-grade corporate bonds. Ideal for conservative investors prioritizing capital preservation.

name: Equity Growth Portfolio
description: An aggressive equity portfolio targeting high-growth companies. Designed for risk-tolerant investors with long-term investment goals.

name: Stable Income Fund
description: A diversified fund generating stable income through dividend-paying stocks and bonds. Perfect for retirees and income-focused investors.

name: Alternative Investment Fund
description: A sophisticated fund investing in alternative assets including real estate, commodities, and hedge fund strategies. For experienced, high-net-worth investors.

name: Balanced Portfolio
description: A well-balanced portfolio with 60% equity and 40% bonds. Suitable for investors seeking growth with moderate risk management.

name: Corporate Bond Fund
description: Investing in high-quality corporate bonds from established companies. Offers better returns than government bonds with minimal additional risk.

name: Tech Innovation Fund
description: Focused on technology and innovation sectors including AI, cloud computing, and renewable energy. High growth potential with increased volatility.

name: Money Market Fund
description: A highly liquid fund investing in short-term securities. Ideal for parking cash with minimal risk and easy access to funds.

name: Dividend Growth Fund
description: Investing in established companies with consistent dividend growth. Combines income generation with capital appreciation potential.

name: Legacy Fund (Discontinued)
description: This product has been discontinued and is no longer available for new investments.
